bbaw.wsp.parser.harvester

Class FileSystemHarvester

  • java.lang.Object
    • bbaw.wsp.parser.harvester.Harvester
      • bbaw.wsp.parser.harvester.FileSystemHarvester

  • public class FileSystemHarvester
extends Harvester
    This static class offers methods to crawl an (UNIX-)file system. It implements the IHarvester interface.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Sascha Feldmann (wsp-shk1)
